Package com.example.lab9.controller

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
com.example.lab9.controller.StudentController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/student") public class StudentController extends Object
Controller for managing student-related operations.

      Registers a new student with the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the student
      Returns:
      a message indicating the result of the registration

      @PostMapping("/enroll") public String enrollInCourse(@RequestParam String studentName, @RequestParam Long courseId)
      Enrolls a student in a course.
      Parameters:
      studentName - the name of the student
      courseId - the ID of the course
      Returns:
      a message indicating the result of the enrollment

      a list of student-course mappings

      Returns:
